message: so tired of it all and seeing things like this on fb

Lisa Lynn, I specifically said Racism is here and Racism is going to destroy this nation we love.....and I specifically said we need to bridge the increasing gap among our of all our races!!!!! Also, I racism is alive in all races-ALL! Why do we have to have any labels when reporting the news....as you first comment was fueled by! By your comment you brought race in which is race baiting!!!! The only way """"WE"""" (ALL RACES INCLUDED) can change is when crimes are committed...treat the people for the crime not calling it out because the pigment of their skin! All I was trying to encourage is, we as a whole nation because to treat everyone according to being fellow man not treat them because they are of a different skin tone!! But I'm guessing, by reading you comeback comments...YOU DO NOT desire a change!!! The racial divisions are acceptable for you!! Take it or leave it!
Exactly! They are not ours to decide their fate. They do not belong to humans and should never be kept in captivity- they do not belong in zoos, ever. Period.
Shut down for one mistake? They are dead for cryin out loud. People are overreacting. It doesn't change the fact they are dead lol
Hey, liberals...perhaps we're not sheep and don't always agree with everything he does...could that be it? We're not Hillary supporters.

Ms. Cortinhas, I could care less if she is a woman, so don't claim you know the reason people are voting for her. The fact she is NOT Donald Trump, is the reason I would vote for her. If you choose to IGNORE the facts of Donald Trump which I could present you with a """"laundry list"""" twice the size of the one you gave us then by all means you vote for him. There are quite a few items on that list I could put down that Mr. Trump has presented to us in the last year during the campaign. I don't see one item on your list of Ms. Clinton's that is recent. Mr. Trump is a racist bigot who demeans women, those that are disabled, those of different sexual orientations, people of color and those of different religions, which is exactly the backbone of this country. If he doesn't get his way, he pouts and blames every one else. I am sorry that is not the kind of leader I want for my country. If you choose to dwell in the past, then by all means do so.

There would be no jokes, or memes if you hadn't killed him. The safety of the child could have been done without killing him. You took a risk killing him, possibly missing him and hitting the child. Using darts would have been the same risk. No matter how many you would have needed.
Bloggers over think. Too much. They sometimes make little things a bigger deal and the more credit you give in to sexism, the bigger deal it becomes. Who cares. Wear whatever you want.
